Date :  ${object.name}

Name of Organisation :${object.employer_id.name}

Organisation SDL :${object.sdl_no}

Dear  ${object.sdf_id.name},

The reasons provided in your appeal for an extension are valid reasons for your Organisation to have missed the regulated deadline.

Your Organisation will be permitted to complete a submission electronically on our on line system until the 31st of May 2018. If the submission is completed in this timeframe and approved by the HSETA it will be granted an, “Accepted” status.

Completing this submission will enable your Organisation to participate in the Mandatory and Discretionary Funding for the 2019 Year. Please ensure that you are well prepared for next year’s submission and provide us with a new plan for 2018-2019 .That deadline is the 30th of April 2018

Please contact us for any further assistance or clarity you need. Ms Motshidisi Marera: motshidisim@hwseta.org / 011 607 7026

Warm Regards
Patrick Samuels
Executive Manager
HWSETA
